Mathematica.translation:
BesselJ[- GCD[m +Divide[1,2]], x] == (GCD[- 1])^(m + 1)* BesselY[m +Divide[1,2], x]
BesselY[- GCD[m +Divide[1,2]], x] == (GCD[- 1])^(m)* BesselJ[m +Divide[1,2], x]

Maple.translation: BesselJ(- gcd(m +(1)/(2)), x) = (gcd(- 1))^(m + 1)* BesselY(m +(1)/(2), x); BesselY(- gcd(m +(1)/(2)), x) = (gcd(- 1))^(m)* BesselJ(m +(1)/(2), x)

definiens.definition: complete elliptic integral of the second kind

isPartOf: F(\varphi,k) = F\left(\varphi \,|\, k^2\right) = F(\sin \varphi ; k) = \int_0^\varphi \frac {\mathrm{d}\theta}{\sqrt{1 - k^2 \sin^2 \theta}}

incomplete elliptic integral of the first kind

Mathematica.translation: LogIntegral[x] == Limit[Integrate[Divide[1,Log[t]], {t, 0, 1 - \[CurlyEpsilon]}, GenerateConditions->None]+ Integrate[Divide[1,Log[t]], {t, 1 + \[CurlyEpsilon], x}, GenerateConditions->None], \[CurlyEpsilon] -> 0, Direction -> "FromAbove", GenerateConditions->None]

Maple.translation: Li(x) = limit(int((1)/(ln(t)), t = 0..1 - varepsilon)+ int((1)/(ln(t)), t = 1 + varepsilon..x), varepsilon = 0, right)

formulae.formula: E(x, y; u) := \sum_{n=0}^\infty u^n \, \psi_n (x) \, \psi_n (y) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi (1 - u^2)}} \, \exp\left(-\frac{1 - u}{1 + u} \, \frac{(x + y)^2}{4} - \frac{1 + u}{1 - u} \, \frac{(x - y)^2}{4}\right)
formulae.semanticFormula: E(x , y ; u) : = \sum_{n=0}^\infty u^n \psi_n(x) \psi_n(y) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi (1 - u^2)}} \exp(- \frac{1 - u}{1 + u} \frac{(x + y)^2}{4} - \frac{1 + u}{1 - u} \frac{(x - y)^2}{4})

formulae.formula: \int_{-\infty}^\infty \frac {\gamma\left(\frac s 2, z^2 \pi \right)} {(z^2 \pi)^\frac s 2} e^{-2 \pi i k z} \mathrm d z = \frac {\Gamma\left(\frac {1-s} 2, k^2 \pi \right)} {(k^2 \pi)^\frac {1-s} 2}

Mathematica.translation: \[CapitalPhi]*(z , s , a) == Divide[1,1 - z]*Divide[1,(a)^(s)]+ Sum[Divide[(- 1)^(n)* L*Subscript[i, - n]*(z),(n)!]*Divide[Pochhammer[s, n],(a)^(n + s)], {n, 1, N - 1}, GenerateConditions->None]+ O*((a)^(- N - s))

formulae.formula: \lim_{q\to 1}\;_{j}\phi_k \left[\begin{matrix} q^{a_1} & q^{a_2} & \ldots & q^{a_j} \\ q^{b_1} & q^{b_2} & \ldots & q^{b_k} \end{matrix} ; q,(q-1)^{1+k-j} z \right]=\;_{j}F_k \left[\begin{matrix} a_1 & a_2 & \ldots & a_j \\ b_1 & b_2 & \ldots & b_k \end{matrix} ;z \right]
formulae.semanticFormula: \lim_{q\to 1}_{j} \Eulertotientphi[k]@{n} [\begin{matrix} q^{a_1} & q^{a_2} & \ldots & q^{a_j} \\ q^{b_1} & q^{b_2} & \ldots & q^{b_k} \end{matrix} ; q ,(q - 1)^{1+k-j} z] =_{j} \hyperF@{a}{b}{c}{z}_k [\begin{matrix} a_1 & a_2 & \ldots & a_j \\ b_1 & b_2 & \ldots & b_k \end{matrix} ; z]

formulae.formula: \begin{pmatrix}  j \\  m \quad m'\end{pmatrix}:= \sqrt{2 j + 1}\begin{pmatrix}  j & 0 & j \\  m & 0 & m'\end{pmatrix}= (-1)^{j - m'} \delta_{m, -m'}
formulae.semanticFormula: \begin{pmatrix}  j \\  m \quad m'\end{pmatrix}:= \sqrt{2 j + 1}\begin{pmatrix}  j & 0 & j \\  m & 0 & m'\end{pmatrix}= (-1)^{j - m'} \delta_{m, -m'}

formulae.formula: \sum_{j_7 j_8} (2j_7+1)(2j_8+1)  \begin{Bmatrix}    j_1 & j_2 & j_3\\    j_4 & j_5 & j_6\\    j_7 & j_8 & j_9  \end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix}    j_1 & j_2 & j_3'\\    j_4 & j_5 & j_6'\\    j_7 & j_8 & j_9  \end{Bmatrix}  = \frac{\delta_{j_3j_3'}\delta_{j_6j_6'} \begin{Bmatrix} j_1 & j_2 & j_3 \end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_4 & j_5 & j_6\end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_3 & j_6 & j_9 \end{Bmatrix}}         {(2j_3+1)(2j_6+1)}
formulae.semanticFormula: \sum_{j_7 j_8} (2j_7+1)(2j_8+1)  \begin{Bmatrix}    j_1 & j_2 & j_3\\    j_4 & j_5 & j_6\\    j_7 & j_8 & j_9  \end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix}    j_1 & j_2 & j_3'\\    j_4 & j_5 & j_6'\\    j_7 & j_8 & j_9  \end{Bmatrix}  = \frac{\delta_{j_3j_3'}\delta_{j_6j_6'} \begin{Bmatrix} j_1 & j_2 & j_3 \end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_4 & j_5 & j_6\end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_3 & j_6 & j_9 \end{Bmatrix}}         {(2j_3+1)(2j_6+1)}

Mathematica.translation: Subscript[K, k]*(x ; n , q) == Sum[(- q)^(j)*(q - 1)^(k - j)*Binomial[n - j,k - j]*Binomial[x,j], {j, 0, k}, GenerateConditions->None]

SymPy.translation: Symbol('{K}_{k}')*(x ; n , q) == Sum((- q)**(j)*(q - 1)**(k - j)*binomial(n - j,k - j)*binomial(x,j), (j, 0, k))

Mathematica.translation: Sum[Divide[\[Mu]^(x),(x)!]*Subscript[C, n]*(x ; \[Mu])*Subscript[C, m]*(x ; \[Mu]), {x, 0, Infinity}, GenerateConditions->None] == \[Mu]^(- n)* (e)^\[Mu]* (n)!*Subscript[\[Delta], n*m]

Maple.translation: sum(((mu)^(x))/(factorial(x))*C[n]*(x ; mu)*C[m]*(x ; mu), x = 0..infinity) = (mu)^(- n)* (e)^(mu)* factorial(n)*delta[n*m]

formulae.semanticFormula: p_n(q^{-x} + q^{x+1} cd ; a , b , c , d ; q) = \qgenhyperphi{4}{3}@{a_0,\dots,a_r}{b_1,\dots,b_s}{q}{z} [\begin{matrix} q^{-n} &abq^{n+1}&q^{-x}&q^{x+1}cd\\aq&bdq&cq\\ \end{matrix} ; q ; q]

definiens.definition: term of the basic hypergeometric function

Mathematica.translation: Subscript[M, n]*(x , \[Beta], \[Gamma]) == Sum[(- 1)^(k)*Binomial[n,k]*Binomial[x,k]*(k)!*Pochhammer[x + \[Beta], n - k]*\[Gamma]^(- k), {k, 0, n}, GenerateConditions->None]

Maple.translation: M[n]*(x , beta , gamma) = sum((- 1)^(k)*binomial(n,k)*binomial(x,k)*factorial(k)*pochhammer(x + beta, n - k)*(gamma)^(- k), k = 0..n)

formulae.formula: x(1-x) \frac {\partial^2F_1(x,y)} {\partial x^2} + y(1-x) \frac {\partial^2F_1(x,y)} {\partial x \partial y} + [c - (a+b_1+1) x] \frac {\partial F_1(x,y)} {\partial x} - b_1 y \frac {\partial F_1(x,y)} {\partial y} - a b_1 F_1(x,y) = 0
formulae.semanticFormula: x(1 - x) \frac{\partial^2 \AppellF{1}@{\alpha}{\beta}{\beta'}{\gamma}{x}{y}(x , y)}{\partial x^2} + y(1 - x) \frac{\partial^2 \AppellF{1}@{\alpha}{\beta}{\beta'}{\gamma}{x}{y}(x , y)}{\partial x \partial y} + [c -(a + b_1 + 1) x] \frac{\partial \AppellF{1}@{\alpha}{\beta}{\beta'}{\gamma}{x}{y}(x , y)}{\partial x} - b_1 y \frac{\partial \AppellF{1}@{\alpha}{\beta}{\beta'}{\gamma}{x}{y}(x , y)}{\partial y} - a b_1 \AppellF{1}@{\alpha}{\beta}{\beta'}{\gamma}{x}{y}(x , y) = 0

Mathematica.translation: D[S, {z, 2}]+(Sum[Divide[Subscript[\[Gamma], j],z - MathieuCharacteristicA[j, q]], {j, 1, N}, GenerateConditions->None])*Divide[d*S,d*z]+Divide[V*(z),Product[z - MathieuCharacteristicA[j, q], {j, 1, N}, GenerateConditions->None]]*S == 0

Maple.translation: diff(S, [z$(2)])+(sum((gamma[j])/(z - MathieuA(j, q)), j = 1..N))*(d*S)/(d*z)+(V*(z))/(product(z - MathieuA(j, q), j = 1..N))*S = 0

definiens.definition: family of basic hypergeometric orthogonal polynomial

isPartOf: \begin{align}(z-1) \frac{d}{dz} P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}(z) &= \frac{1}{2} (z-1)(1+\alpha+\beta+n)P_{n-1}^{(\alpha+1,\beta+1)} \\&= n P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - (\alpha+n) P_{n-1}^{(\alpha,\beta+1)} \\&=(1+\alpha+\beta+n) \left( P_n^{(\alpha,\beta+1)} - P_{n}^{(\alpha,\beta)} \right) \\&=(\alpha+n) P_n^{(\alpha-1,\beta+1)} - \alpha P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} \\&=\frac{2(n+1) P_{n+1}^{(\alpha,\beta-1)} - \left(z(1+\alpha+\beta+n)+\alpha+1+n-\beta \right) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}}{1+z} \\&=\frac{(2\beta+n+nz) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - 2(\beta+n) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta-1)}}{1+z} \\&=\frac{1-z}{1+z} \left( \beta P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - (\beta+n) P_{n}^{(\alpha+1,\beta-1)} \right) \, .\end{align}
\sum_{n=0}^\infty P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}(z) t^n = 2^{\alpha + \beta} R^{-1} (1 - t + R)^{-\alpha} (1 + t + R)^{-\beta}

definiens.definition: recurrence relation for the Jacobi polynomial

Mathematica.translation: JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], z] == Divide[Pochhammer[\[Alpha]+ 1, n],(n)!]*HypergeometricPFQ[{- n , 1 + \[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ n}, {\[Alpha]+ 1}, Divide[1,2]*(1 - z)]

Maple.translation: JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, z) = (pochhammer(alpha + 1, n))/(factorial(n))*hypergeom([- n , 1 + alpha + beta + n], [alpha + 1], (1)/(2)*(1 - z))

formulae.semanticFormula: \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{z} = \frac{\EulerGamma@{\alpha + n + 1}}{n! \EulerGamma@{\alpha + \beta + n + 1}} \sum_{m=0}^n{n\choose m} \frac{\EulerGamma@{\alpha + \beta + n + m + 1}}{\EulerGamma@{\alpha + m + 1}}(\frac{z-1}{2})^m

Mathematica.translation: JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], z] == Divide[Gamma[\[Alpha]+ n + 1],(n)!*Gamma[\[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ n + 1]]*Sum[Binomial[n,m]*Divide[Gamma[\[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ n + m + 1],Gamma[\[Alpha]+ m + 1]]*(Divide[z - 1,2])^(m), {m, 0, n}, GenerateConditions->None]

Maple.translation: JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, z) = (GAMMA(alpha + n + 1))/(factorial(n)*GAMMA(alpha + beta + n + 1))*sum(binomial(n,m)*(GAMMA(alpha + beta + n + m + 1))/(GAMMA(alpha + m + 1))*((z - 1)/(2))^(m), m = 0..n)

formulae.semanticFormula: \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{z} = \frac{(-1)^n}{2^n n!}(1 - z)^{-\alpha}(1 + z)^{-\beta} \deriv [n]{ }{z} \{(1 - z)^\alpha(1 + z)^\beta(1 - z^2)^n \}

Maple.translation: JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, z) = ((- 1)^(n))/((2)^(n)* factorial(n))*(1 - z)^(- alpha)*(1 + z)^(- beta)* diff((1 - z)^(alpha)*(1 + z)^(beta)*(1 - (z)^(2))^(n), [z$(n)])

recurrence relation for the Jacobi polynomial

formulae.formula: \begin{align}(z-1) \frac{d}{dz} P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}(z) &= \frac{1}{2} (z-1)(1+\alpha+\beta+n)P_{n-1}^{(\alpha+1,\beta+1)} \\&= n P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - (\alpha+n) P_{n-1}^{(\alpha,\beta+1)} \\&=(1+\alpha+\beta+n) \left( P_n^{(\alpha,\beta+1)} - P_{n}^{(\alpha,\beta)} \right) \\&=(\alpha+n) P_n^{(\alpha-1,\beta+1)} - \alpha P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} \\&=\frac{2(n+1) P_{n+1}^{(\alpha,\beta-1)} - \left(z(1+\alpha+\beta+n)+\alpha+1+n-\beta \right) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}}{1+z} \\&=\frac{(2\beta+n+nz) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - 2(\beta+n) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta-1)}}{1+z} \\&=\frac{1-z}{1+z} \left( \beta P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - (\beta+n) P_{n}^{(\alpha+1,\beta-1)} \right) \, .\end{align}
formulae.semanticFormula: \begin{align}(z - 1) \deriv [1]{ }{z} \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{z} &= \frac{1}{2}(z - 1)(1 + \alpha + \beta + n) \JacobipolyP{\alpha + 1}{\beta + 1}{n-1}@{x} \\ &= n \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x} -(\alpha + n) \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta + 1}{n-1}@{x} \\ &=(1 + \alpha + \beta + n)(\JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta + 1}{n}@{x} - \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x}) \\ &=(\alpha + n) \JacobipolyP{\alpha - 1}{\beta + 1}{n}@{x} - \alpha \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x} \\ &= \frac{2(n + 1) \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta - 1}{n+1}@{x} -(z(1 + \alpha + \beta + n) + \alpha + 1 + n - \beta) \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x}}{1+z} \\ &= \frac{(2 \beta + n + nz) \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x} - 2(\beta + n) \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta - 1}{n}@{x}}{1+z} \\ &= \frac{1-z}{1+z}(\beta \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x} -(\beta + n) \JacobipolyP{\alpha + 1}{\beta - 1}{n}@{x}) .\end{align}

Mathematica.translation: (z - 1)*D[JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], z], {z, 1}] == Divide[1,2]*(z - 1)*(1 + \[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ n)*JacobiP[n - 1, \[Alpha]+ 1, \[Beta]+ 1, x] == n*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], x]-(\[Alpha]+ n)*JacobiP[n - 1, \[Alpha], \[Beta]+ 1, x] == (1 + \[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ n)*(JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta]+ 1, x]- JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], x]) == (\[Alpha]+ n)*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha]- 1, \[Beta]+ 1, x]- \[Alpha]*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], x] == Divide[2*(n + 1)*JacobiP[n + 1, \[Alpha], \[Beta]- 1, x]-(z*(1 + \[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ n)+ \[Alpha]+ 1 + n - \[Beta])*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], x],1 + z] == Divide[(2*\[Beta]+ n + n*z)*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], x]- 2*(\[Beta]+ n)*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta]- 1, x],1 + z] == Divide[1 - z,1 + z]*(\[Beta]*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], x]-(\[Beta]+ n)*JacobiP[n, \[Alpha]+ 1, \[Beta]- 1, x])

Maple.translation: (z - 1)*diff(JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, z), [z$(1)]) = (1)/(2)*(z - 1)*(1 + alpha + beta + n)*JacobiP(n - 1, alpha + 1, beta + 1, x) = n*JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, x)-(alpha + n)*JacobiP(n - 1, alpha, beta + 1, x) = (1 + alpha + beta + n)*(JacobiP(n, alpha, beta + 1, x)- JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, x)) = (alpha + n)*JacobiP(n, alpha - 1, beta + 1, x)- alpha*JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, x) = (2*(n + 1)*JacobiP(n + 1, alpha, beta - 1, x)-(z*(1 + alpha + beta + n)+ alpha + 1 + n - beta)*JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, x))/(1 + z) = ((2*beta + n + n*z)*JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, x)- 2*(beta + n)*JacobiP(n, alpha, beta - 1, x))/(1 + z) = (1 - z)/(1 + z)*(beta*JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, x)-(beta + n)*JacobiP(n, alpha + 1, beta - 1, x))

formulae.formula: \sum_{n=0}^\infty P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}(z) t^n = 2^{\alpha + \beta} R^{-1} (1 - t + R)^{-\alpha} (1 + t + R)^{-\beta}
formulae.semanticFormula: \sum_{n=0}^\infty \JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{z} t^n = 2^{\alpha + \beta} R^{-1}(1 - t + R)^{-\alpha}(1 + t + R)^{-\beta}

Mathematica.translation: Sum[JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], z]*(t)^(n), {n, 0, Infinity}, GenerateConditions->None] == (2)^(\[Alpha]+ \[Beta])* (R)^(- 1)*(1 - t + R)^(- \[Alpha])*(1 + t + R)^(- \[Beta])

Maple.translation: sum(JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, z)*(t)^(n), n = 0..infinity) = (2)^(alpha + beta)* (R)^(- 1)*(1 - t + R)^(- alpha)*(1 + t + R)^(- beta)
JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, cos(theta)) = (n)^(-(1)/(2))* k*(theta)*cos(sqrt(AiryAi(1, x)^2+AiryBi(1, x)^2)*theta + gamma)+ O*((n)^(-(3)/(2)))

Mathematica.translation:
Limit[(n)^(- \[Alpha])* JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], Cos[Divide[z,n]]], n -> Infinity, GenerateConditions->None] == (Divide[z,2])^(- \[Alpha])* Subscript[J, \[Alpha]]*(z)
Limit[(n)^(- \[Beta])* JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], Cos[\[Pi]-Divide[z,n]]], n -> Infinity, GenerateConditions->None] == (Divide[z,2])^(- \[Beta])* Subscript[J, \[Beta]]*(z)

Maple.translation: limit((n)^(- alpha)* JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, cos((z)/(n))), n = infinity) = ((z)/(2))^(- alpha)* J[alpha]*(z); limit((n)^(- beta)* JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, cos(pi -(z)/(n))), n = infinity) = ((z)/(2))^(- beta)* J[beta]*(z)

isPartOf: \sum_{n=0}^\infty P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}(z) t^n = 2^{\alpha + \beta} R^{-1} (1 - t + R)^{-\alpha} (1 + t + R)^{-\beta}

\begin{align}(z-1) \frac{d}{dz} P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}(z) &= \frac{1}{2} (z-1)(1+\alpha+\beta+n)P_{n-1}^{(\alpha+1,\beta+1)} \\&= n P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - (\alpha+n) P_{n-1}^{(\alpha,\beta+1)} \\&=(1+\alpha+\beta+n) \left( P_n^{(\alpha,\beta+1)} - P_{n}^{(\alpha,\beta)} \right) \\&=(\alpha+n) P_n^{(\alpha-1,\beta+1)} - \alpha P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} \\&=\frac{2(n+1) P_{n+1}^{(\alpha,\beta-1)} - \left(z(1+\alpha+\beta+n)+\alpha+1+n-\beta \right) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)}}{1+z} \\&=\frac{(2\beta+n+nz) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - 2(\beta+n) P_n^{(\alpha,\beta-1)}}{1+z} \\&=\frac{1-z}{1+z} \left( \beta P_n^{(\alpha,\beta)} - (\beta+n) P_{n}^{(\alpha+1,\beta-1)} \right) \, .\end{align}

definiens.definition: recurrence relation for the Jacobi polynomial

formulae.semanticFormula: \contdualHahnpolyS{n}@{x^2}{a}{b}{c} = \genhyperF{3}{2}@{- n , a + ix , a - ix}{a + b , a + c}{1}
\JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x} = \lim_{t\to\infty} t^{-n} \contHahnpolyp{n}@{\tfrac12 xt}{\tfrac12(\alpha + 1 - it)}{\tfrac12(\beta + 1 + it)}{\tfrac12(\alpha + 1 + it)}{\tfrac12(\beta + 1 - it)}

definiens.definition: case of the continuous Hahn polynomial

formulae.semanticFormula: \sum_{s=a}^{b-1} w_n^{(c)}(s , a , b) w_m^{(c)}(s , a , b) \rho(s) [\Delta x(s - \frac{1}{2})] = \delta_{nm} d_n^2

Mathematica.translation: Sum[w(Subscript[w, n])^(c)*(s , a , b)*w(Subscript[w, m])^(c)*(s , a , b)*\[Rho]*(s)*(\[CapitalDelta]*x*(s -Divide[1,2])), {s, a, b - 1}, GenerateConditions->None] == Subscript[\[Delta], n*m]*(Subscript[d, n])^(2)

SymPy.translation: Sum(w(Symbol('{w}_{n}'))**(c)*(s , a , b)*w(Symbol('{w}_{m}'))**(c)*(s , a , b)*Symbol('rho')*(s)*(Symbol('Delta')*x*(s -(1)/(2))), (s, a, b - 1)) == Symbol('{Symbol('delta')}_{n*m}')*(Symbol('{d}_{n}'))**(2)

formulae.semanticFormula: \contHahnpolyp{n}@{x}{a}{b}{\conj{a}}{\conj{b}}(x ; a , b , c|q) = a^{-n} e^{-inu} \qmultiPochhammersym{abe^{2iu} , ac , ad}{q}{n} *_4 \Phi_3(q^{-n} , abcdq^{n-1} , ae^{i{(t+2u)}} , ae^{-it} ; abe^{2iu} , ac , ad ; q ; q)
\contHahnpolyp{n}@{x}{a}{b}{\conj{a}}{\conj{b}}(x ; a , b , c \mid q) = \frac{\qmultiPochhammersym{ab , ac}{q}{n}}{a^n} \cdot{_3\Phi_2}(q^- n , ae^{i\theta} , ae^{-i\theta} ; ab , ac \mid q ; q)

title: Orthogonal polynomials on the unit circle

formulae.formula: P_n(x) = c_n \, \det \begin{bmatrix}m_0 & m_1 &  m_2 &\cdots & m_n \\m_1 & m_2 &  m_3 &\cdots & m_{n+1} \\&&\vdots&& \vdots \\m_{n-1} &m_n& m_{n+1} &\cdots &m_{2n-1}\\1 & x & x^2 & \cdots & x^n\end{bmatrix}
formulae.semanticFormula: P_n(x) = c_n  \det \begin{bmatrix}m_0 & m_1 &  m_2 &\cdots & m_n \\m_1 & m_2 &  m_3 &\cdots & m_{n+1} \\&&\vdots&& \vdots \\m_{n-1} &m_n& m_{n+1} &\cdots &m_{2n-1}\\1 & x & x^2 & \cdots & x^n\end{bmatrix}
\KrawtchoukpolyK{n}@{x}{p}{N}(\lambda(x) ; c , N|q) =_3 \Phi_2(q^{-n} , q^{-x} , cq^{x-N} ; q^{-N} , 0|q ; q)

\littleqJacobipolyp{n}@{x}{a}{b}{q}(x ; a|q) = \qgenhyperphi{2}{1}@{q^{-n} , 0}{aq}{q}{qx} = \frac{1}{\qmultiPochhammersym{a^{-1} q^{-n}}{q}{n}} \qgenhyperphi{2}{0}@{a_0,\dots,a_r}{b_1,\dots,b_s}{q}{z}(q^{-n} , x^{-1} ; ; q , x / a)

formulae.formula: P_{n}(x;a\mid q) = a^{-n} e^{in\phi} \frac{a^2;q_n}{(q;q)_n} {_3}\Phi_2(q^-n, ae^{i(\theta+2\phi)}, ae^{-i\theta}; a^2, 0 \mid q; q)
formulae.semanticFormula: P_{n}(x ; a \mid q) = a^{-n} e^{in\phi} \frac{a^2;q_n}{\qmultiPochhammersym{q}{q}{n}}{_3} \Phi_2(q^- n , ae^{i(\theta+2\phi)} , ae^{-i\theta} ; a^2 , 0 \mid q ; q)

Mathematica.translation: LegendreQ[v, \[Mu], 3, x] == Cos[(\[Mu]*\[Pi])*]*(Divide[1 + x,1 - x])^(\[Mu]/2)*Divide[F*(v + 1 , - v ; 1 - \[Mu]; 1/2 - 2/x),\[CapitalGamma]*(1 - \[Mu])]

title: Incomplete Bessel K function/generalized incomplete gamma function

Mathematica.translation: Subscript[K, v]*(x , y) == Integrate[Divide[(e)^(- x*t -Divide[y,t]),(t)^(v + 1)], {t, 1, Infinity}, GenerateConditions->None]
